title: Desenvolvedor(a) Laravel Sênior - Presencial
description:
O Desenvolvedor Sênior é um profissional altamente experiente e qualificado, com no mínimo 5 anos de experiência em desenvolvimento de software, que lidera projetos complexos e é capaz de conduzi-los do início ao fim.

Este profissional demonstra um domínio avançado da lógica de programação e da linguagem PHP, além de habilidades em segurança, código limpo e escalabilidade de sistemas.

O Desenvolvedor Sênior é um líder natural, capaz de orientar, motivar e desenvolver outros membros da equipe, disseminando conhecimento e garantindo a excelência técnica em todos os aspectos do desenvolvimento de software.

Requisitos:
  • Pelo menos 5 anos de experiência comprovada em desenvolvimento de software.
  • Domínio avançado da lógica de programação e da linguagem PHP.
  • Experiência comprovada em liderança de projetos complexos.
  • Habilidades avançadas em Git e controle de versão.
  • Excelentes habilidades de comunicação e capacidade de fornecer feedback construtivo.
  • Capacidade de motivar, orientar e desenvolver outros membros da equipe.
  • Forte compromisso com a excelência técnica e a qualidade do código.
  • Graduação em Ciência da Computação, Engenharia de Software, Sistemas de Informação ou áreas correlatas.
  • Residir em Cuiabá-MT ou Várzea Grande - MT.
Diferenciais:
  • Experiência com metodologia ágil (SCRUM e KANBAN).
  • Experiência com softwares de CRM.
  • Experiência com sistemas financeiros (empréstimos, consignados).

title: Analista Fiscal JR
description:
Vem ser Analista Fiscal Júnior no time da Fábrica do Livro!

Somos apaixonados por imprimir ideias em páginas de livros, livretos e apostilas e estamos em busca de um Analista Fiscal Júnior apaixonado por garantir a conformidade e eficiência dos nossos processos fiscais.

Como Analista Fiscal Júnior , você será uma peça fundamental na gestão fiscal e tributária da empresa, especialmente nas operações envolvendo papel imune, garantindo que tudo esteja de acordo com a legislação vigente.

Assim, seu dia a dia será analisar e classificar produtos e serviços , emitir e conferir notas fiscais , apurar tributos , preparar declarações fiscais e prestar suporte em auditorias fiscais , tudo isso contribuindo para a eficiência da nossa operação com papel imune.

Atividades

  • Analisar e classificar produtos e serviços, especialmente relacionados ao uso de papel imune;
  • Emitir e conferir notas fiscais eletrônicas;
  • Realizar a conferência mensal de impostos (ICMS, Difal, IPI);
  • Preparar e enviar declarações fiscais e relatórios periódicos;
  • Verificar a conformidade de documentos fiscais e contábeis;
  • Prestar suporte em auditorias fiscais;
  • Manter-se atualizado sobre a legislação tributária;
  • Elaborar relatórios sobre a situação fiscal da empresa.

Requisitos

Soft Skills:

  • Boa comunicação;
  • Trabalho em equipe;
  • Atenção aos detalhes;
  • Organização.

Hard Skills:

  • Formação superior em Contabilidade, Administração, Economia ou áreas afins;
  • Conhecimento em legislação tributária, especialmente em relação a papel imune;
  • Habilidade em Excel e outros softwares de análise de dados.

Diferencial:

  • Experiência prática com processos fiscais de papel imune.

title: Software Engineer (Integrity)
description:
Want to help us, help others? We’re hiring!

GoFundMe is a global community of over 150 million people who come together every day with the common purpose of helping one another. Our mission is to help people help each other through our best in class technology. In 2022, GoFundMe joined together with Classy, a leading nonprofit fundraising software company that enables nonprofits to connect supporters with the causes they care about. Together, we have empowered people and organizations to raise more than $30 billion since 2010. Our vision is to become the most helpful place in the world.

Join us! As a Senior Full Stack Engineer on the Integrity team at GoFundMe, you will play a pivotal role in empowering fundraiser organizers to create timely, authentic, and compliant campaigns. Your expertise will help ensure that donors feel confident they are supporting real people and genuine causes. By fostering a trustworthy platform through innovative technical solutions, you will enhance customer satisfaction, drive successful campaigns, and uphold our commitment to protecting the integrity of GoFundMe and its customers.

Candidates considered for this role will be located in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

The Job…

  • Collaborate with product managers and engineers to develop and enhance features for GoFundMe.
  • Work on a combination of backend and frontend, while leveraging third-party vendors to build a robust platform and user experiences.
  • Participate in code reviews to ensure adherence to internal standards for style, maintainability, and best practices.
  • Independently ship features and improvements with minimal guidance.
  • Participate in on-call rotations to troubleshoot and resolve urgent engineering issues.
  • Identify technical debt and proactively propose and implement solutions.
  • Advocate for codebase improvements and provide leadership and guidance within the team.

You…

  • 3+ years of professional experience developing REST APIs using a backend framework like Spring or Django on external customer-facing applications.
  • Professional experience with relational database design.
  • Professional experience with modern JavaScript frameworks such as React, Angular, Vue.js, or Next.js.
  • Experience using Git in a workplace environment.
  • Experience working in an agile, intensely iterative software development process.
  • Experience with performance and optimization problems and the ability to both diagnose and prevent these problems.
  • Experience with application performance monitoring and log analytics tools. We use New Relic and Sumo Logic.

Preferred…

  • Experience with Kotlin, Java, and GraphQL.
  • Experience with React and Next.js.
  • Experience with cloud platforms like AWS, GCP, or Azure.
  • Experience with CI/CD - specifically GitHub actions and merge queues.

Why you’ll love it here...

  • Make an Impact: Be part of a mission-driven organization making a positive difference in millions of lives every year.
  • Innovative Environment: Work with a diverse, passionate, and talented team in a fast-paced, forward-thinking atmosphere.
  • Collaborative Team: Join a fun and collaborative team that works hard and celebrates success together.
  • Competitive Benefits: Enjoy competitive pay and comprehensive healthcare benefits.
  • Holistic Support: Enjoy financial assistance for things like hybrid work, family planning, and commuting, along with generous parental leave, flexible time-off policies, and mental health and wellness resources to support your overall well-being.
  • Growth Opportunities: Participate in learning, development, and recognition programs to help you thrive and grow.
  • Commitment to DEI: Contribute to diversity, equity, and inclusion through ongoing initiatives and employee resource groups.
  • Community Engagement: Make a difference through our volunteering and Gives Back programs.

We live by our core values: impatient to be great, find a way, earn trust every day, fueled by purpose . Be a part of something bigger with us!

GoFundMe is proud to be an equal opportunity employer that actively pursues candidates of diverse backgrounds and experiences. We are committed to providing diversity, equity, and inclusion training to all employees, and we do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, ethnicity, nationality or national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity or expression, pregnancy status, marital status, age, medical condition, mental or physical disability, or military or veteran status.

If you require a reasonable accommodation to complete a job application or a job interview or to otherwise participate in the hiring process, please contact us at

title: Consultor de Relacionamento de Rede PL
description:
Na MetLife, você será parte de um time que trabalha com muita paixão, colaboração e acolhimento. Aqui, temos um ambiente de trabalho inclusivo, onde todos podem ser quem são!

Contamos com grupos internos de diversidade, equidade e inclusão, e já recebemos diversos prêmios e reconhecimentos por nossos trabalhos em prol da sociedade, sustentabilidade e diversidade.

Estamos liderando a transformação global de um setor definido há tempos pela nossa empresa. Com uma única missão, mas diferentes perspectivas, estamos comprometidos em fazer a diferença na vida de nossos clientes.

No Brasil desde 1999, mas com mais de 150 anos de história como uma das principais empresas de serviços financeiros do mundo, estamos presentes em mais de 40 países, atendendo mais de 100 milhões de clientes.

Quer se tornar um MetLifer? Estamos te esperando!

Cargo: Consultor de Relacionamento de Rede PL
Local de trabalho: São Paulo

O propósito da posição:

Atuação está contemplada integralmente na área de Rede Credenciada, a qual possui uma missão, a de atuar em uma área específica e customizada de Relacionamento com os prestadores da rede (dentistas contratados para atender as demandas assistências do produto odontológico adquirido).

O objetivo principal está em criar vínculo com os prestadores, sendo um canal direto e diferenciado de acolhimento para todas as possíveis demandas que possam surgir, além de manter/ garantir a capilaridade territorial e as respectivas suficiências/ especialidades de atendimento em relação as vidas da carteira vinculadas ao seu município de atuação (gestão de rede). Visitas externas, visitas virtuais, atendimento a qualquer necessidade de solicitação do vigente contratado, dúvidas gerais, monitoramento do perfil de atendimento, dentre outras funções, estão sob responsabilidade do consultor.

Requisitos para o cargo:

  1. Graduação completa em Odontologia;
  2. Perfil relacional, vendas, comunicativo, persuasivo, dinâmico;
  3. Foco em fidelização/ retenção da rede credenciada;
  4. Boa comunicação verbal e escrita (fundamental);
  5. Capacidade: resiliência (área com grande impacto nas demais, área “ofensora” do negócio, portanto é fundamental saber lidar com pressão/ cobranças).
  6. Experiência na área de operadoras de saúde suplementar (mercado odontológico);
  7. Disponibilidade para viagens e trabalhos externos;
  8. Cumprir o cronograma proposto;
  9. Atingir as metas acordadas em consenso com a gestão;
  10. Identificar, criar, revisitar (melhorias de processos);
  11. Interatividade com as demais áreas (Auditoria/ prospecção de rede/ Clientes);
  12. Formar / identificar – prestadores com perfil de rede referências;
  13. Contribuir para a redução de impactos assistenciais originados por ausência de rede e/ou prestadores capacitados para atendimento de uma determinada especialidade/ procedimento;
  14. Retenção de rede;
  15. Adequação de rede (manutenção e expansão de territórios/ capilaridade);
  16. Adequação de rede (especialidades de atendimento balanceados em conformidade com os critérios vigentes da operadora).

O que oferecemos?

  • Salário competitivo;
  • Vale Refeição;
  • Vale Alimentação;
  • Assistência médica;
  • Assistência odontológica;
  • Seguro de vida;
  • Previdência Privada;
  • Participação nos lucros;

A MetLife orgulha-se de ser um empregador que oferece oportunidades iguais, empenhado em atrair, reter e maximizar o desempenho de uma força de trabalho diversificada e inclusiva. A política da MetLife é assegurar igualdade de oportunidades de emprego sem qualquer discriminação ou assédio baseado em raça, cor, religião, sexo, orientação sexual, identidade ou expressão de gênero, idade, invalidez, nacionalidade ou estado civil, cidadania ou por qualquer motivo.

Os dados pessoais informados e coletados serão tratados e armazenados pela MetLife, incluindo suas subsidiárias e afiliadas, ou por empresas terceiras por estas contratadas, no Brasil ou fora dele, para fins relacionados ao recrutamento, seleção e/ou processo de contratação, respeitando o disposto no Aviso de Privacidade de Dados da Metlife disponível em .

Benefícios que Oferecemos

Reconhecida na lista da revista Fortune das "Empresas Mais Admiradas do Mundo" de 2024 e no Índice Global de Inclusão da Seramount 2023, a MetLife, por meio de suas subsidiárias e afiliadas, é uma das principais empresas de serviços financeiros do mundo, oferecendo seguros, benefícios para funcionários e gestão de ativos para clientes individuais e institucionais. Com operações em mais de 40 mercados, ocupamos posições de liderança nos Estados Unidos, América Latina, Ásia, Europa e Oriente Médio.

Nosso propósito é simples: ajudar nossos colegas, clientes, comunidades e o mundo em geral a criar um futuro mais confiante. Unidos pelo propósito e guiados pela empatia, estamos inspirados a transformar o próximo século em serviços financeiros. Na MetLife, #AllTogetherPossible. Junte-se a nós!

title: Desenvolvedor SAP ABAP - Boa Viagem/PE
description:
Faça parte do nosso time! Vem ser #MagnumTires

Sobre nós:

Em 2024 completaremos 33 anos de mercado. Somos uma empresa líder em importação e distribuição de pneus e câmaras de ar no Brasil, atuando neste mercado desde 1991, data de fundação. Possuímos filiais nas cinco regiões do país, com mais de 50 unidades próprias, contando com 3 grandes centros de distribuição localizados no nordeste e sul do país.

A Magnum Tires atende a todo território Nacional através de uma vasta rede de Distribuidores e Unidades Próprias, totalizando mais de 500 profissionais trabalhando de forma direta e indireta no atendimento ao cliente. #AMagnumÉShow

Responsabilidades e Atribuições:

  • Desenvolver soluções de negócios em programas e integrações SAP, com o objetivo de satisfazer as expectativas dos clientes, permitindo a continuidade das operações e geração de novos negócios.
  • Programação ABAP;
  • Module Pool’s (Table control, Tab Strip, Custom Container, Status GUI, Subscreen, PBO e PAI, ALV Cockpit);
  • User Exit, Field Exit, Search Help, Badis, Enhancement-points;
  • Structured Programming (Report, Function Group, Functions, Views and Cluster Views);
  • Object Oriented Programming (Local Class, Global Class, Visibility, Attributes, Methods, Inheritance and Events);
  • Data (Batch-Input / BAPIs, jobs, RFC, Call Transaction, Outbound);
  • Application SAP Note;
  • Forms (Sapscript / Smartforms / AdobeForms);
  • Elaboração de especificação técnica;
  • Elaboração de estimativas de desenvolvimento;
  • Integração entre plataformas e sistemas satélites com o SAP através do SCPI;
  • Apoiar na arquitetura de dados;
  • Propor boas práticas de codificação e indicar simplificações de processo através de automações de desenvolvimento;
  • Aplicação de metodologia ágil na rotina de desenvolvimento de software.

Requisitos:

  • Graduação em Sistema da Informação, Ciência da Computação e Engenharia da Computação.
  • Expertise em SAP e desenvolvimento ABAP.
  • Experiência com programação.
  • Metodologia Ágil.

title: Gerente de Agência - Várzea Grande/MT
description:
Job description

Somos humanos

Entendemos a diversidade e a inclusão como fundamentais para o desenvolvimento da sociedade. Por isso, procuramos ser cada vez mais diversos. Para que mais pessoas possam ter orgulho do que fazemos juntos!

Você conhece a Certificação ANBIMA?

Anbima é a sigla da Associação Brasileira das Entidades dos Mercados Financeiro e de Capitais. Ela é responsável por definir uma série de boas práticas para as empresas desses setores, além de oferecer certificações para os profissionais das áreas. Dentre as certificações que ela possui, temos: CPA10, CPA20 e CEA.

  • CPA-10 é uma certificação importante para os profissionais do mercado financeiro. Além de ser obrigatória para atuação direta em prospecção, vendas e atendimentos a investidores, ela lhe tornará mais capacitado dentro do mercado.
Main responsibilities
  • Apoiar no desenvolvimento da equipe, avaliações periódicas, informais e formais, fomentar o desenvolvimento das competências comportamentais e técnicas necessárias para o desenvolvimento individual e coletivo, identificar e viabilizar ações de capacitação;
  • Liderar e executar o planejamento da agência. Projetar e realizar o encaminhamento das ações necessárias à manutenção e ampliação da base de associados e o incremento dos resultados de negócios do segmento (MC, ISA, etc);
  • Monitorar o nível da satisfação e da qualidade do atendimento de associados via canais digitais, auto atendimento e rede credenciada, elaborando e analisando as métricas de engajamento;
  • Gerir os riscos inerentes as operações da agência. Responder pela movimentação financeira da agência. Atuar como procurador da Cooperativa, representando em todas as esferas necessárias para o atendimento das questões legais e de negócios;
  • Prestar consultoria financeira aos associados e demais públicos de interesse, nas dependências da agência e em visitas externas, prestando informações técnicas sobre produtos e serviços, a fim de qualificar o atendimento e efetivar negociações;
  • Realizar a gestão das demandas de ouvidoria junto a equipe visando solucionar os apontamentos e assegurar a resolução de demandas dos associados;

#J-18808-Ljbffr

title: Senior Software Engineer | CODE
description:
Your wellbeing matters. Join a company that cares.

GET TO KNOW US

Wellhub (formerly Gympass) is a corporate wellness platform that connects employees to the best partners for fitness, mindfulness, therapy, nutrition, and sleep, all included in one subscription designed to cost less than each individual partner. Founded in 2012 and headquartered in NYC, we have a growing global team in 11 countries. At Wellhub, you have the opportunity to build a career in a high-growth tech company that places wellbeing at the foundation of its culture, and contribute to making every company a wellness company.

THE OPPORTUNITY

We are hiring a Senior Backend Software Engineer to our Partner Content team in Brazil !

The Partner Content team in Product & Technology plays a crucial role in shaping subscriber experiences with partners. The team owns the end-to-end journey of partner information, from the initial upload in the Partners Portal to its presentation in the Wellhub app, impacting millions of users daily. This includes building, updating, and maintaining a comprehensive range of partner details, such as logos, company information, contact details, and activities. Essentially, the team ensures that subscribers have access to accurate and engaging partner content, exceeding their expectations and enhancing their overall experience.

YOUR IMPACT
  • Work within an agile full-stack talented engineering team;
  • Help to define the architecture of systems and integrations, bring innovation to the table, and make sure design docs are up to date;
  • Support existing systems looking to enhance functionality, increase scale, and transform in new ways to meet our product demands;
  • Take part in incident resolution and troubleshooting in the production environment, as well as in writing useful and critical post-mortems;
  • Help and mentor other developers;
  • Work with cutting-edge technologies and edge cases on a global scale;
  • Follow-up engineering and product KPIs;
  • Live the mission: inspire and empower others by genuinely caring for your own wellbeing and your colleagues.
WHO YOU ARE
  • An engineer with a bachelor’s degree in computer science or equivalent professional experience;
  • Experience in designing and developing modern web applications;
  • Proficient in one or more programming languages (Java / Golang / Kotlin). Golang and Kotlin will both be considered a plus;
  • Experience with SQL and NoSQL technologies, such as PostgreSQL, Redis;
  • Solid architecture knowledge (event-driven architectures; serverless);
  • Being open to new experiences, willing to learn and grow;
  • Communication skills to work with multidisciplinary teams located in several countries with different cultures;
  • A believer in automation (be it tests, CI/CD, or something else entirely);
  • An engineer with advanced proficiency in English.
  • You have the ability to work both autonomously and collaboratively in a team environment;
  • A self-starter who can multi-task and adapt to a fast-growing organization;
  • You enjoy working on multiple priorities and projects;
  • A strong communicator both written and verbal;
  • You are tenacious and goal-oriented.

We recognize that individuals approach job applications differently. We strongly encourage all aspiring applicants to go for it, even if they don't match the job description 100%. For this specific role, please note that prior experience in AWS and Backend languages are mandatory requirements.

WHAT WE OFFER YOU (Latam)

We're a wellness company that is committed to the health and wellbeing of our employees. Our flexible program allows you to customize your benefits, according to your needs!

Our benefits include:

  • WELLNESS: Health, dental, and life insurance.
  • FLEXIBLE WORK: At Wellhub, flexibility fosters a happier, healthier, and more productive work environment for everyone. We offer two work model options: flexible hybrid and full remote.
  • FLEXIBLE SCHEDULE: Wellhubbers and their leaders can make the best decisions for their scope.
  • WELLHUB: Access onsite gyms and fitness studios, digital fitness programs, and online wellness resources.
  • PAID TIME OFF: Vacations after 6 months and 3 days off per year + 1 day off for each year of tenure (up to 5 additional days) + extra day off for your birthday.
  • PAID PARENTAL LEAVE: We offer 100% paid parental leave to all new parents and extended maternity leave.
  • CAREER GROWTH: Outstanding opportunities for personal and career growth.
  • CULTURE: An exciting and supportive atmosphere with ambitious people from around the world!
Diversity, Equity, and Belonging at Wellhub

We aim to create a collaborative, supportive, and inclusive space where everyone knows they belong.

Wellhub is committed to creating a diverse work environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, religion, color, sex, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, non-disqualifying physical or mental disability, national origin, veteran status, or any other basis covered by appropriate law.

title: Gerente de Hotel
description:
Gerente de Hotel é responsável por garantir a operação eficiente e lucrativa do hotel, liderando as equipes, otimizando os processos internos e proporcionando uma experiência excepcional aos hóspedes. Sua função abrange a gestão das operações diárias, a supervisão das áreas de atendimento, vendas e finanças, e o desenvolvimento de estratégias que alinhem os objetivos do hotel às expectativas dos clientes e às metas financeiras.

Requisitos do Cargo:

Formação Acadêmica:

  1. Graduação em Gestão de Hospedagem, Administração, Turismo, ou áreas correlatas.
  2. Pós-graduação ou MBA em áreas relacionadas, como Gestão Hoteleira, Gestão Financeira ou Marketing, é um diferencial.

Experiência Profissional:

  1. Experiência de pelo menos 2 anos em cargos de liderança.

1. Gestão Operacional:

  1. Supervisionar as operações diárias do hotel, garantindo que todos os departamentos (recepção, serviços de alimentação, limpeza, manutenção, entre outros) funcionem de maneira integrada.
  2. Implementar e monitorar os padrões de qualidade e os processos operacionais, garantindo a excelência no serviço e a satisfação dos hóspedes.
  3. Gerenciar o fluxo de hóspedes, coordenando reservas, check-ins e check-outs, e garantindo a ocupação ideal do hotel.
  4. Monitorar a limpeza, manutenção e segurança das instalações, coordenando com as equipes responsáveis.

2. Gestão de Equipe:

  1. Liderar, treinar e motivar a equipe do hotel, assegurando que todos os membros do staff compreendam suas funções e ofereçam atendimento de alta qualidade.
  2. Realizar recrutamento e seleção de funcionários, acompanhando o desempenho e promovendo programas de desenvolvimento profissional.
  3. Resolver conflitos internos e promover um ambiente de trabalho saudável e colaborativo.

3. Gestão Financeira:

  1. Controlar e monitorar o orçamento do hotel, incluindo custos operacionais.
  2. Desenvolver estratégias para otimizar a receita, como promoções, pacotes especiais e parcerias comerciais.

4. Atendimento ao Cliente:

  1. Garantir que as necessidades dos hóspedes sejam atendidas de maneira eficiente e personalizada.
  2. Monitorar a satisfação dos hóspedes através de pesquisas de opinião e feedback direto.
  3. Resolver reclamações ou problemas de hóspedes de maneira rápida e eficaz, garantindo a fidelização.

5. Marketing e Vendas:

  1. Desenvolver estratégias de marketing para promover o hotel e aumentar a taxa de ocupação, trabalhando com o departamento de vendas e marketing.
  2. Estabelecer parcerias com agências de viagens.
  3. Participar da criação de pacotes promocionais e oferecer pacotes.

6. Compliance e Sustentabilidade:

  1. Garantir que o hotel esteja em conformidade com as regulamentações locais de segurança, saúde e licenciamento.

title: SOX BP & IT Testing Ops Manager
description:
Welcoming, collaborative and having the opportunity to make an impact - is how our employees describe working here. Galileo is a financial technology company that provides innovative and revolutionary software products and services that power some of the world's largest Fintechs. We are the only payments innovator that applies tech and engineering capabilities to empower Fintechs and financial institutions to unleash their full creativity to achieve their most inspired goals. Galileo leads its industry with superior fraud detection, security, decision-making analytics and regulatory compliance functionality combined with customized, responsive and flexible programs to accelerate the success of all payments companies and solve tomorrow's payments challenges today. We hire energetic and creative employees while providing them the opportunity to excel in their careers and make a difference for our clients. Learn more about us and why we work here at .

The role:

The Sarbanes-Oxley (SOX) Program Management Office (PMO) and Testing Operations Center at SoFi, are part of the Controllership and are responsible for ensuring the company has the necessary internal control and assessment elements in place to meet the USA’s SEC SOX requirements. The SOX Function is split between the PMO and Testing Operations functions. The PMO facilitates risk assessment and scoping to determine project scope of each reporting year, there is a separate Testing PMO (separate from this Testing Operations Center) that partners with the PMO to strategize testing plans and approaches.

Responsibilities for the individual contributor SOX BP/IT Testing Operations Center Manager:

  • Directly execute the control testing and reviews as assigned by the Testing PMO.
  • Report to the SOX Testing Operations Center Senior Manager, supporting oversight of testing execution to ensure testing is timely and performed per set standards.
  • Manage 1-2 direct reports who will execute SOX testing.
  • Execute assessments and reviews of control design and operating effectiveness testing, as well as remediation testing where applicable.
  • Document and raise identified deficiencies and key observations/recommendations with the SOX PMO and Management.
  • Act as subject matter expert in SOX testing area over Business and IT Process controls.
  • Build and maintain ongoing relationships with various lines of business included in the company's SOX process.
  • Adhere to and comply with all applicable federal and state laws, regulations, and guidance, as well as company policies and procedures.
  • Work directly with SoFi's external auditors to maximize reliance on the SOX PMO's work.
  • Support other assignments and ad hoc matters as required.

What you’ll need:

  • Bachelor's Degree in Accounting, Administration or related field.
  • 6+ years of BP SOX Testing related experience.
  • Business proficiency and fluency in oral and written English and Spanish.
  • Located in Buenos Aires area with access to the Galileo LATAM office periodically.
  • In-depth knowledge focused on Business SOX, ICFR, COSO Framework, and baseline understanding of IT controls.
  • Practical and deep knowledge of SOX and COSO along with experience testing Business and IT controls.
  • Proficiency in performing and detailed reviewing of BP and expertise in report testing.
  • Driven by excellence, high integrity, critical thinking, analytical and strategic skills.
  • Ability to navigate independently within an ambiguous environment.
  • Organized, detailed, proactive, self-motivated, collaborative.
  • Strong teamwork and communication skills (both oral and written).
  • Adaptability to change and ability to prioritize workloads to meet deadlines.
  • Strong project management skills with experience in concurrently managing multiple projects.
  • Support of SoFi and Galileo's business model and values.

Nice to have:

  • Big 4 Accounting Firm experience is strongly preferred.
  • CPA and CIA/CISA or equivalent required.
  • FinTech, banking and/or financial services experience primarily focused on BP and IT SOX and ICFR controls consulting.

Oferecemos remuneração competitiva, incluindo salário fixo e variável, benefícios e oportunidade de crescimento profissional em uma empresa sólida e em expansão.

title: IT Business Partner - Operações de Marketing em Tecnologia MRM (LatAm/NA)
description:
IT Business Partner - Operações de Marketing em Tecnologia MRM (LatAm/NA)

Esta posição está baseada em São Paulo, no formato Híbrido (2x no escritório) com flexibilidade.

Na Kenvue, damos vida ao extraordinário poder do cuidado diário. Com base em mais de um século de tradição e nos fundamentos da ciência, contamos com marcas icônicas, incluindo Neutrogena, Tylenol, Listerine, Johnson’s e curativos da marca Band-Aid que você já conhece e adora. Nossa equipe global é composta por aproximadamente 22.000 pessoas diversas e brilhantes, apaixonadas por insights, inovação e comprometidas em entregar os melhores produtos aos nossos clientes.

O que você fará

Estamos em busca de um especialista em MRM com mentalidade digital para apoiar o Proprietário Técnico Global da Plataforma (TPO) na implementação de soluções como Gerenciamento de Recursos de Marketing (MRM) e seu suporte ao Gerenciamento de Ativos Digitais (DAM) .

Escopo da Função:
O ITBP abrange 2 das 4 regiões globais, com duas posições abertas para cobrir o escopo global em áreas de responsabilidade como:

  • Gerenciar a criação e o refinamento de histórias de usuário para atender aos objetivos dos parceiros de negócios e manter um backlog saudável.
  • Suportar a priorização do roadmap do TPO Global, definindo claramente o valor para o negócio, viabilidade, custos e prazos de entrega dos itens do backlog.
  • Facilitar o modelo de engajamento entre as equipes técnicas e parceiros de negócios para construir e manter a plataforma.

Principais Responsabilidades:

  • Contribuir ativamente para a visão geral da plataforma e executar de forma tática para proporcionar uma experiência contínua e eficiente para o cliente/usuário.
  • Estabelecer uma forte parceria com diversos stakeholders da organização.
  • Apoiar a criação e gestão do roadmap de MRM, utilizando dados, pesquisas e objetivos interfuncionais.
  • Realizar descobertas, definir e refinar requisitos seguindo o framework INVEST.
  • Demonstrar mentalidade de "dono" para as regiões NA e LatAm.
  • Ser responsável por métricas-chave, como:
  • NPS (Net Promoter Score).
  • Impacto no Negócio.
  • Saúde do backlog.
  • Otimização do tempo de ciclo e entregas com alta qualidade.

Educação e Experiência:

  • Formação Acadêmica: Graduação obrigatória, preferencialmente em Sistemas de Informação, Tecnologia da Informação, Administração ou Ciência da Computação.
  • Idiomas: Inglês e português fluentes.
  • Experiência: Desejável experiência em empresas de bens de consumo de alta rotatividade.

Competências-Chave:

  • Experiência em sintetizar requisitos de diversos stakeholders em uma estratégia de plataforma única.
  • Experiência liderando a seleção, construção e integração de plataformas.
  • Proatividade, orientação para ação e soluções.
  • Excelentes habilidades de comunicação empresarial.
  • Capacidade de motivar equipes e membros de projetos.

Horários e Viagens:

  • Disponibilidade para participar de reuniões em horários flexíveis.
  • Disponibilidade para viajar até 15% (doméstico ou internacional).

· Pacote competitivo de recompensas totais*

· Feriados pagos pela empresa, férias pagas, tempo de voluntariado e muito mais!

A Kenvue tem orgulho de ser uma empregadora de oportunidades iguais. Todas as pessoas candidatas qualificadas serão consideradas para o emprego com base em necessidades de negócios, requisitos de trabalho e qualificações individuais.

title: Senior Software Engineer, Otter - São Paulo
description:
Senior Software Engineer, Otter

Who we are

Otter offers a wide range of software and hardware solutions for restaurants. Some examples include unifying all orders across platforms (Uber Eats, Doordash etc), QR code ordering, POS, Kiosk, printers etc. The wide range of products brings an interesting set of complexity in terms of discovery and risks to reduce.

What you’ll do

  • Data-Driven Development: Contribute to our data-centric development efforts.
  • Project Planning: Participate in strategic planning for various internal tools.
  • Agile Methodologies: Implement and test software using agile methodologies.
  • Collaborative Teamwork: Work closely with a team to enhance and support our technology.
  • Code Contribution: Write, debug, maintain, and test code across multiple projects.
  • Architectural Design: Design scalable systems with a focus on robust architecture.
  • Innovation: Drive innovation within the team and support technological advancements at CSS.

What we’re looking for

  • Education: Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or equivalent.

  • Individual Contribution: Proven track record of significant contributions in previous roles, demonstrating your impact.
  • Architectural Skills: Ability to design and create robust architecture from scratch and evolve existing systems.
  • Communication Skills: Strong communication and presentation skills, with the ability to collaborate with non-engineering stakeholders.
  • Technical Expertise: Experience designing and implementing scalable, reliable, and efficient distributed systems. Familiarity with Java is required.
  • Application Maintenance: Experience in maintaining and extending large-scale, high-traffic applications.

What else you need to know

This role is based in our São Paulo office location. We believe that people do their best work when they are together. As a company, we’re in the marketplace of ideas and innovation. When you’re constantly innovating, changing how an industry works, inventing new products and processes - and we are doing all these things - we believe we’re better as a team in person. That’s why all of our teams (except for our field-based roles) are now working from one of our office locations 5 days a week.

Ready to join us as we serve those who serve others?

title: Data Lead - Metro Manila, Philippines
description:
General

What we do

Our mission is to empower building materials suppliers with great technology. There are over $1,000,000,000,000 of building materials bought in the US every year, and many of these transactions happen in on-prem point-of-sale systems. We want to bring these transactions online, enabling better experiences for contractors and homeowners alike.

This Role

What you'll achieve with us

You'll be on the ground floor of a high-growth company:

  • Be located in Metro Manila or surrounding locations (Laguna, Rizal, Cavite, and Bulacan), overseeing data exports from legacy POS systems like QuickBooks, Decor Fusion, RockSolid, and more.
  • Perform manual data entry tasks with precision and attention to detail.
  • Utilize tools like Salesforce, Google Workspace, internal Google tools, and Microsoft Excel to streamline and support your work.

Compensation and other benefits

  • Earn $175 per week as an Independent Contractor.
  • Enjoy monthly team dinners in the Alabang or BGC area.
  • Note: The benefits listed below are not included.

Requirements

  • You hold a bachelor’s degree in a related field, such as Business Administration, Information Technology, Management Information Systems, Accounting, Finance, or a similar discipline.
  • You are proficient in Google Sheets, Microsoft Excel, Salesforce, and point-of-sale systems.
  • You have exceptional attention to detail.
  • You have a reliable high-speed internet connection and your own laptop.
  • Your availability aligns with the schedule: Tuesdays to Saturdays, 6:00 AM to 2:00 PM Philippine Time.
  • You’re prepared to work overtime during client go-live events and be on-call as needed.
  • This is a full-time role, requiring flexibility to work beyond regular hours, especially during critical periods.

Icing on the cake

  • You have hands-on experience with point-of-sale (POS) systems.
  • You are proficient in using Salesforce.
  • You are familiar with Google Internal Tools.
  • You excel in working with Google Sheets and Microsoft Excel.
  • You have prior experience in a fast-growing startup environment.

Interview Process

  1. Screening Call (30 minutes): A remote call with Jackie, our first Data Lead.
  2. Interview (30 minutes): A remote interview with Amanda, Head of Finance, Recruiting, and Operations.
  3. Homework Assignment (2-hour prep): After the introductory call, instructions for the homework task will be sent.
  4. On-Site Interview (1 hour): An in-person interview focusing on your ability to learn quickly.
  5. Culture Fit Discussion (30 minutes): A conversation with Amanda about your experience and career goals.
  6. Sample Task (30 minutes): A practical exercise involving data export and a detail-oriented assessment.
  7. Culture Call (30 minutes): A remote interview with Karen and Jackie, Data Leads at Rundoo.
  8. Final Call (30 minutes): A remote interview with Tyler, who will be managing you.
  9. Reference Check: Provide two substantial references for evaluation.
Who we are

In alphabetical order:

  1. Adam (Territory Account Executive): studied Communications at UConn and worked as an AE at a large cloud software company; a frequent at concerts around the greater NYC area.

  2. Amanda (Head of Finance & Operations): studied Marketing Management at De La Salle University; worked in recruiting & operations at a few Bay Area startups; loves building teams, scuba diving, & hiking!

  3. Andrew (CTO): studied computer science & humanities at Stanford; worked as a software engineer and head of engineering at Apple & Anova; danced with the SF ballet.

  4. Andy (Territory Account Executive): studied Business Management at Oklahoma State University; worked as an AE for large tech like Cisco System and small startups.

  5. Boxuan (Engineering): studied computer science at the Ohio State University; worked as an engineer at Bytedance and other companies.

  6. Brian (Engineering): studied computer science & applied math; worked as an engineer at Google and Snap.

  7. Claire (Head of Client Success): studied History at Dartmouth College; worked in Account Management and Customer Success at Yahoo and other companies.

  8. Clara (Territory Account Executive): studied Literature at University College London; worked in GTM strategy for a feminine health tech startup.

  9. Daniel (Territory Account Executive): studied Biology at University of Washington; worked in sales in pharmaceuticals and FinTech.

  10. Emmie (Engineering): studied math & computer science at Stanford; worked as a software engineer at Flexport.

  11. Erin (Territory Account Executive): studied Communications and Biology; worked in SaaS sales at Cisco and Bloomerang.

  12. George (Engineering): studied computer science at Stanford; worked as a software engineer at Facebook.

  13. Jackson (Engineering): studied computer science at Stanford; worked as an engineer at Palo Alto Networks.

  14. Jonathan (Territory Account Executive): studied Linguistics; worked in SaaS implementation for a startup.

  15. Jordan (Engineering): studied computer engineering; interned at Rivian and IBM.

  16. Kyle (Territory Account Executive): studied Anthropology and History; has been a seller for various companies.

  17. Lej (Client Success): worked directly in the field of software for the last three years helping entrepreneurs and start-ups.

  18. Matt (Head of Sales): studied history; taught middle school and worked in sales and general management.

  19. Nick (CEO): studied math & computer science; worked as a trader and PM at various companies.

  20. Noah (Product Designer): studied Art Practice; worked as a Product Designer at several startups.

  21. Rae (Sales Development Rep): studied Business Management; worked as an account executive.

  22. Santiago (Engineering): studied computer engineering; worked as SWE intern at various companies.

  23. Tyler (Data and Client Success): studied general education and tech; worked as a system administrator and manager.

  24. Umer (Engineering): studied computer science; worked as a SWE intern.

  25. Vidhan (Product): studied Biomedical Engineering and Econ; worked as a PM at various companies.

  26. Zach (Design): studied product design; worked in design at a few startups.

What we stand for

The values we hold most dear are learning through feedback and experimentation, enjoying our time together, truly empathizing with clients, building a diverse team, and driving to achieve as fast as we can.

How we've fundraised

We've raised $18m across three rounds:

  1. A $2m pre-seed led by Kent Bennett at Bessemer.
  2. A $5m seed led by Caitlin Bolnick Rellas at CRV.
  3. An $11m series A led again by Bessemer and CRV.

Benefits

  • And more! If you have ideas, let us know.

No Rio Grande do Norte, conta com a filial no município de Macaíba, que envasa, comercializa e distribui seus produtos em Natal e principais cidades potiguares.

A Naturágua é a única empresa de água mineral do Norte e Nordeste a ser certificada com a ISO22000 pelo Bureau Veritas Certification (BVC). Inovação, qualidade e pioneirismo são seus princípios.

Atuará na liderança de equipes multidisciplinares, utilizando metodologias ágeis para garantir a entrega de projetos dentro dos prazos, orçamentos e escopos definidos. O profissional será responsável por identificar e mitigar riscos, gerenciar a comunicação entre as partes interessadas, e promover a melhoria contínua nos processos de gestão de projetos.

Esse profissional terá um papel chave na definição de prioridades do portfólio, alocação eficiente de recursos e suporte à tomada de decisões estratégicas, além de atuar como facilitador entre as áreas técnica e de negócios. Ele deverá assegurar a eficiência operacional e a otimização de processos, fomentando uma cultura de alta performance, colaboração e inovação.

Principais Responsabilidades
  1. Gerenciar o portfólio de projetos, garantindo que estejam alinhados com as metas e a estratégia da empresa.
  2. Liderar e motivar equipes promovendo a autonomia e colaboração.
  3. Aplicar metodologias ágeis (Scrum, Kanban) para otimizar a eficiência e garantir a entrega dos projetos no prazo.
  4. Gerenciar stakeholders, promovendo comunicação eficaz e alinhamento entre as áreas.
  5. Implementar e acompanhar KPIs de desempenho dos projetos.
  6. Identificar e mitigar riscos ao longo do ciclo de vida dos projetos.
  7. Controlar o orçamento, cronograma e escopo dos projetos sob sua gestão.
  8. Promover a melhoria contínua dos processos e da gestão de projetos dentro da organização.
  9. Garantir a qualidade e o cumprimento das entregas, conforme acordado com os clientes internos e externos.

title: Corporate Quality & ISO Compliance
description:
By providing any personal data to Mitel (including sensitive personal data) through this website or email addresses provided on this website, you consent to Mitel’s processing and use of your personal data for recruitment purposes and the transfer of your data within Mitel and/or to third parties throughout the world as necessary to process your job application. For more information about the way Mitel handles your personal data, please review our candidate privacy policy here:

Corporate Quality & ISO Compliance

Apply locations Sao Paulo time type Full time posted on Posted 15 Days Ago job requisition id R011727

At Mitel, you will have the opportunity to help businesses connect, collaborate and provide better experiences for our customers. You will deliver valuable contributions in creating business success within our global organization utilizing your unique attributes, skills and experience.

Please take a moment to look over this opportunity and if interested, feel free to send us your application.

Overview:

As part of our global action Quality Management team at Mitel, you will be responsible to manage and maintain several areas of our Integrated Management System Program to secure ISO compliance and Management System objectives.

As a certified ISO Auditor, you are located in Brazil, Sao Paulo, but acting as part of a Quality Management department on a corporate level. You have to manage and perform internal and external audits via remote interviews and sometimes also onsite in locations all over the world related to ISO standards (mainly ISO 9001, ISO 14001 + ISO 20000-1, ISO 27001).

Ensure issues impacting business operations get identified, prioritized, actioned, and resolved cross-functionally. Identify improvement areas also covering supplier Due Diligence and lead improvement initiatives together with the business and process owners to achieve quality and performance targets, including monitoring of corrective actions. Support and consult all business areas and functions in strong collaboration with global and local teams to secure business strategy and achievement of objectives.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Following on the Mitel strategy, objectives, and goals for the Mitel Management System program related to specific ISO standards and internal Policies.
  • Manage and execute Management System and ISO related actions to achieve required certification levels.
  • Perform Data analytics by extracting key insights from relevant data sources.
  • Perform internal and external audits or surveys in strong collaboration with business representatives and Subject Matter experts to identify improvement areas.
  • Lead quality initiatives and drive actions to create and execute corrective actions and their effectiveness.

Additional Responsibilities:

  • Create/ update and maintain a library of key documents including:
  • Mitel Management System related Policies, procedures, templates and definitions
  • Support and consult the Leadership team and functions on all levels with best practice techniques and tips
  • Develop and implement training methods, materials, and modules to enable and improve the organisation to learn and apply quality management practices
Operate ISO related activities:
  • Manage and maintain Internal audit program.
  • Perform internal ISO audit interview sessions including preparation and audit documentation
  • Join external audits and support audit sessions as Subject Matter expert
  • Manage, maintain and coordinate the update of ISO specific corporate risk registers and environmental aspects registers
  • Manage, maintain and coordinate environment related legal registers (including annual country specific regulatory obligation assessments) with stakeholders on corporate and country level
Collaborate with cross-functional leaders of all functions and at all levels to create organizational awareness and importance of quality management across the organisation.Advice and support the Senior Management team related to ISO / normative business standards.Support audit program to observe high Quality within process management and operations.Perform audits and surveys to observe Supplier Quality related aspects (Due Diligence).Support Management System Managers in the countries / HQ functions.Support the annual external audit program and onboarding of new locations to the ISO Multi-Site certificates.Support execution of Management Reviews.HQ–coordination of functions and roles need to be involved to manage and secure ISO compliance.

Requirements:

  • ISO internal or lead Auditor certificates: ISO 9001 and ISO 14001 required
  • ISO internal or lead Auditor certificates: ISO 20000-1 ISO and 27001 desired or willing to be obtained
  • College/university degree in Quality Management, Business Administration, Engineering, or a related field is preferred, or equivalent experience with 5-7 years in Quality Management, specifically in ISO management systems and audits.
  • Robust understanding about Communication industry
  • Ability to investigate, report and resolve incidents.
  • Understanding of process management and continuous improvement
  • Ability to write well-structured policies and internal documents as per established ISO standards.
  • Excellent analytical, organizational and communication skills
  • Fluent English language skills

Mitel is committed to achieving workforce diversity and creating an inclusive working environment. Diversity makes sense for us, for our customers and for our future. We value different perspectives, skills and experiences, and welcome applications from all sections of the community.

About Us

Mitel is a global market leader in business communications, powering more than two billion business connections with our cloud, enterprise and next-gen collaboration applications.

With more than 70 million users in nearly 100 countries, Mitel is the only company that wakes up every day exclusively focused on helping customers take their communications from where they are today to where they expect them to be.

title: Fire Equipment Maintenance Specialist
description:
Summary:

This position will be responsible for providing preventative maintenance and mechanical repair work related to specialized fire vehicles, heavy fire apparatus, other related fire/emergency equipment, various light to heavy trucks up to class 8, and small construction equipment. This position will report to the Vehicle Maintenance Facility (VMF) supervisor. The duties and responsibilities listed below are representative of the nature and level of work assigned and are not necessarily all inclusive.

Position Responsibilities:

  1. Responsible for maintaining a safe workplace and ensuring that safety is the highest priority in the workplace.

  2. Complies with all Environmental Health & Safety and Quality Assurance requirements and goals. Provide documentation to these divisions as necessary to ensure adequate and legal documentation.

  3. Diagnoses, troubleshoots, repairs, and maintains small construction equipment, specialized fire vehicles, heavy fire apparatus, other related fire/emergency equipment, various light to heavy trucks up to Class 8, and small construction equipment.

  4. Corrects deficiencies in components and ancillary equipment.

  5. Performs service, maintenance, repairs and overhauls in accordance with manufacturers’ recommendations.

  6. Performs equipment repairs in response to maintenance requests, in shop or in field locations.

  7. Uses diagnostic procedures and test equipment to identify and correct equipment faults.

  8. Analyzes and diagnoses mechanical, hydraulic, pneumatic, electric, and electronic faults.

  9. Operates shop equipment including overhead cranes, welders, compressors, presses, grinders, hand tools, and tire servicing equipment.

  10. Operates recovery vehicle and performs recovery functions, sometimes outdoors in extreme environmental conditions.

  11. Performs major maintenance on compressed air foam (CAF) systems units used for aircraft rescue and firefighting (ARFF). These systems contain from 300 to 600 gallons of aircraft firefighting foam expelled by high-pressure compressed air and include 500 lbs. of dry chemical. These systems use “Tri-Max” technology.

  12. Checks operating efficiency of fire vehicles, heavy fire apparatus, and fire mechanical equipment.

  13. Repairs and adjusts engines, transmissions, brake systems, hydraulic systems, water pumps, and accessories.

  14. Ensures pump systems provide appropriate volumes of water at specified pressures during periodic and required annual pump testing.

  15. Tunes engines; cleans, repairs, and replaces carburetors, fuel systems, pumps, strainers, fuel lines, fuel tanks, gauges, and wires; and reconditions electrical systems.

  16. Performs general maintenance of all fire equipment, including oiling and lubricating various components.

  17. Performs heavy vehicle systems and component failure analyses.

  18. Ensures fire apparatus conforms to National Fire Protection Association (N.F.P.A.) standards.

  19. Responds to emergency callouts and mutual aid requests for mechanic services and perform emergency field repairs on fire apparatus and related equipment.

  20. May work day, night or swing shifts depending on operational needs.

  21. Assists other mechanics and members of the VMF team as required.

  22. Maintains thorough and accurate service logs and records of maintenance performed including diagnosis, root cause, labor, and parts in Maximo or other approved methods.

  23. Conducts parts and repair requirements research.

  24. Provides input to supervisor regarding equipment utilization, equipment replacement, and equipment needs.

  25. Provides classroom and hands-on instruction to Antarctic Fire Department personnel pertaining to maintenance and operation of fire apparatus and related equipment.

  26. Assists the VMF supervisor in identifying appropriate training opportunities with a goal of providing succession training for the position.

  27. Keeps tools, equipment, and work area clean, organized, and in good working condition.

  28. Road tests vehicles.

  29. Observes and follows all safety rules and procedures, including wearing required personal safety equipment.

  30. Performs additional duties and projects as assigned.

Required Education, Experience, Certificates and Licenses:

  1. High School diploma or GED

  2. At least five (5) years’ experience as an Emergency Vehicle Technician or six (6) years’ experience as a vehicle mechanic with the ability to certify as an Emergency Vehicle Technician, or five (5) years’ experience as a vehicle mechanic with one summer or winter Antarctic deployment working as a light vehicle or heavy equipment technician.

  3. Demonstrated knowledge of methods and tools used in repair and maintenance of fire vehicle apparatus, including diesel engines, fire pumps, hydraulic, electrical, and pneumatic systems.

  4. Demonstrated knowledge of N.F.P.A. standards for commercial and fire vehicles.

  5. Demonstrated knowledge of automotive repairs and maintenance.

Expected Skills and Competencies:

  1. Demonstrated mechanical aptitude.

  2. Ability to operate and drive a variety of fire vehicles and equipment.

  3. Ability to understand, diagnose, and repair modern fire apparatus electrical systems, including computerized engine, transmission, and brake systems.

  4. Knowledge of basic record keeping and work order system procedures.

  5. Working knowledge of diagnostic software as it relates to general automotive fleet, fire apparatus and heavy vehicle equipment.

  6. Basic computer skills using Microsoft Office Suite applications and computerized fleet work order systems.

  7. Ability to work in a fast-paced environment that requires handling multiple tasks at a given time and rapidly adapting to changing priorities and schedules.

  8. Cross-cultural sensitivity with an international perspective.

  9. Excellent organizational and time management skills.

  10. Ability to become an active and functioning member of a team.

  11. Ability to be innovative and be an agent for change.

  12. Strong written and verbal communication skills to facilitate and disseminate information.

  13. Proficiency in lifting and bracing large and heavy parts/equipment with jacks, cranes, floor lift and cribbing is required.

  14. Ability to use mechanic tools and diagnostic equipment with skill and safety.

  15. Ability to follow directions.

  16. Ability to establish and maintain effective work relationships with those contacted in the performance of required duties.

Preferred:

  1. EVT Certifications, ASE certifications, and dealership certifications are a plus.

  2. Two years training at a technical school is highly desirable.

  3. Relevant overseas automotive mechanical experience is preferred.

  4. Hands-on experience working with equipment manufactured by Oshkosh, Pierce or E-One, Ford, International, and Freightliner is highly desirable.

  5. Previous USAP experience or experience with remote polar operations is preferred.

  6. Knowledge of principles and processes involved in supporting vehicle maintenance functions at an overseas facility.

  7. Knowledge of sound mechanical practices as applied to commercial and special-purpose equipment, to include electrical, pneumatic, and hydraulic systems is preferred.

Physical and/or Other Requirements:

  1. Willingness and ability to deploy to Antarctica for extended periods.

  2. Successful completion of Medical and Dental examinations required by the NSF for deployment to Antarctica.

  3. Successful completion of drug screening and background check required by employer.

  4. Successful completion of Federal Background Check required by the NSF.

  5. Must be willing and able to lift and move items, parts, assemblies, and equipment up to the safety regulation maximum as required by the position.

  6. Must be willing and able to perform physical activities including heavy lifting, climbing in and out of equipment, crawling, and working outdoors in extreme cold as required by the position.

  7. Must participate in community programs, such as “house-mouse” (chores), “daisy-picking” (cleaning-up around the station), recycling efforts & safety objectives.

title: Google Ads PPC Manager (E-Commerce)
description:
About the job Google Ads PPC Manager (E-Commerce)

Job Title: Google Ads PPC Manager (for UK E-Commerce Brand)
Location: RemoteWork Schedule: Monday - Friday, 10am to 6pm on UK timezone (flexible)

NOTE: INDEPENDENT CONTRACTOR POSITION

About Us: We are a fast-growing e-commerce brand based in the UK, looking for an experienced Google AdsPPC Manager to join our digital marketing team. We're seeking someone who can drive our paid search strategy and deliver measurable results through data-driven campaign management and optimisation.

Role Overview:
We're looking for a strategic and analytical PPC Manager who will take ownership of our Google Ads campaigns and help scale our e-commerce business. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record in e-commerce PPC management, with strong expertise in performance marketing and conversion rate optimisation.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Develop and execute comprehensive PPC strategies across Google Ads platforms
  • Manage and optimise multiple campaign types including Search, Shopping, Display, and Performance Max
  • Conduct regular A/B testing of ad copy, landing pages, and campaign elements
  • Create and optimise product feed management for Google Shopping campaigns
  • Monitor and analyse campaign performance, providing regular reports and insights
  • Manage daily budget allocation and bidding strategies
  • Implement conversion tracking and analyse customer journey data
  • Collaborate with the wider marketing team to ensure consistent messaging and branding
  • Identify new growth opportunities and expand into new market segments
  • Optimise landing pages in collaboration with the web development team
  • Stay up-to-date with PPC best practices and industry trends

Required Skills/Experience:

  • 3+ years of hands-on experience managing Google Ads campaigns in an e-commerce environment
  • Proven track record of managing substantial monthly ad spend ($20k+ monthly)
  • Deep understanding of Google Ads platforms, including Search, Shopping, Display, and Performance Max
  • Experience with A/B testing methodologies and statistical significance
  • Strong knowledge of Google Analytics 4 and Google Tag Manager
  • Proficiency in landing page optimisation and conversion rate optimisation (CRO)
  • Experience with bid management tools and automation strategies
  • Strong analytical skills with experience in data analysis and reporting
  • Google Ads certification and other relevant certifications
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English

Preferred Skills:

  • Experience with additional platforms (Microsoft Ads, Meta Ads)
  • Knowledge of SEO principles and their interaction with PPC
  • Experience with e-commerce platforms (Shopify, WooCommerce)
  • Familiarity with heat mapping tools (Hotjar, Crazy Egg)
  • Understanding of UX/UI principles
  • Experience with performance marketing in international markets

What's On Offer:

  • Fully remote position
  • Flexible working schedule on UK hours
  • Work with a fast growing e-commerce brand
  • Paid vacation leave and time off
  • Work with a highly experienced and dedicated team

Note: Please submit your resume and intro video in English only.

title: Sr Program Manager Speed BR, External Fulfillment Latam
description:
Sr Program Manager Speed BR, External Fulfillment Latam

At Amazon, we're working to be the most customer-centric company on earth, so we are constantly looking for ways to improve delivery experience. Our goal is to exceed the expectations of all our customers by ensuring that their orders, no matter how large or small, are delivered where and when they need them, as quickly, accurately, and cost-effectively as possible. To meet this goal, Amazon is continually striving to innovate and provide best-in-class service levels through multiple fulfillment channels.


A successful candidate must be passionate about understanding customer pain points, have an unending desire to uncover root causes of any defect, work independently, be comfortable with ambiguity, and be able to influence internal/external partners at all levels of the organization. This role will particularly suit someone with strong skills in program management, analytics, queries, communication (both written and verbal), relationship building, and customer obsession.


Key Job Responsibilities
  1. This role is responsible for the full picture of External Fulfillment Speed in BR, from day-to-day dive deeps to understanding trends and driving Speed investments.
  2. Developing, implementing, and managing KPI reporting for a portfolio of programs, providing visibility of milestones and performance across all programs and using this data to drive/influence business decisions.
  3. Securing resources, scoping efforts, setting priorities and milestones, and driving delivery of main projects.
  4. Influencing process design and development.
  5. Benchmarking globally to share best practices and improve outcomes for Amazon customers.

BASIC QUALIFICATIONS
  1. Bachelor's degree.
  2. Experience using data and metrics to determine and drive improvements.
  3. 5+ years of program or project management experience.
  4. 5+ years of working cross-functionally with tech and non-tech teams.
  5. Excel at an advanced level and SQL.

PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS
  1. Experience implementing repeatable processes and driving automation or standardization.
  2. Experience in complex problem solving and working in a tight schedule environment.

description:
Aqui, tecnologia anda junto com pessoas e força de mercado há mais de 20 anos. Ao todo, são três ecossistemas de marcas líderes no mercado, que oferecem produtos e serviços para grandes players em mais de 12 países!

Movidas por desafios, apaixonadas em superar limites, destemidas frente aos riscos e focadas em aprender com os erros e em evoluir em conjunto!

Um ecossistema de alta performance para você evoluir sua carreira!

Com marcas que atuam em três ecossistemas: e-commerce, fintechs e transformação digital. Isso significa que temos produtos e serviços voltados para esses segmentos, com marcas líderes de mercado!

No DB1 Group, as pessoas são singularmente plurais: guiadas pelo Código de Cultura, comportamentos e condutas, vibram no mesmo ritmo, valorizando e respeitando a diversidade por trás de cada um. Mais de 750 pessoas seguem alinhadas ao mesmo propósito.

Responsabilidades
  1. Agir com justiça e transparência, passando credibilidade e confiança em cada ação realizada.
  2. Viver cada momento com intensidade, com empenho e com dedicação, e enfrentar os desafios, aproveitando cada segundo da jornada.
  3. Ter confiança para fazer o que é preciso, agir com responsabilidade e autonomia e comprometer-se com a equipe e com as atividades.
  4. Realizar entregas que agreguem valor ao cliente, à equipe e ao Grupo DB1, prezando pela qualidade e pela excelência.
  5. Valorizar as pessoas que estão ao seu lado e cuidar para que todas se desenvolvam, pessoal e profissionalmente.
  6. Realizar cada tarefa com foco para atingir os objetivos, fazer parte e apoiar o time, dando feedbacks honestos e constantes.
  7. Evoluir constantemente, aprendendo com cada erro e transformando problemas em oportunidades.

Tecnologia faz parte da vida de todas as pessoas no DB1 Group.
Aqui, você trabalha com as principais e mais modernas linguagens em diferentes áreas:

Encontros para trocas de experiências sobre tecnologias com foco em projetos do DB1 Group.

Evento em comemoração ao Dia do Programador, com conteúdos incríveis sobre inovação e área tech.

Programa para aprender sobre desenvolvimento de software em vários níveis.

Programa para quem quer começar a codar, com conteúdos em vários formatos para iniciar a jornada!

Atuação internacional

Presente em 12 países

Crescimento acelerado

Entre as 500 empresas que mais crescem na América Latina (Financial Times)

Benefícios em ser parte do DB1 GroupBenefícios flexíveis
  1. DUCZ, cartão aceito em mais de 2 milhões de estabelecimentos feito pelo próprio DB1 Group!
  2. Plano de saúde Unimed, plano odontológico e seguro de vida.
  3. Gympass, auxílio home office, horários flexíveis e possibilidade de trabalho híbrido.
  4. Parceria com a Cambly.
  5. Next1 (programa de indicação de novos colaboradores com premiações) e bônus anual atrelado a metas.
  6. Comitês internos com foco em melhorar o DB1 Group e a sociedade como um todo.
Comemorações

Comemorações de aniversários, baby boomer (ação para bebês recém nascidos), reconhecimento por tempo de casa e celebrações durante o ano.

Acompanhamento individualizado para evolução de carreira, eventos internos, mentorias, subsídio a treinamentos, universidade corporativa e muito mais!

About Grupo Carrefour Brasil

Já imaginou trabalhar no maior varejista do país? Vem com a gente! Somos mais de 135 mil colaboradores e colaboradoras unidos no nosso propósito, que é oferecer uma alimentação acessível e de qualidade a todos os brasileiros e brasileiras, com base em 3 pilares: (1) COMBATE À FOME E DESIGUALDADES, (2) INCLUSÃO E DIVERSIDADE e (3) PROTEÇÃO DO PLANETA E BIODIVERSIDADE.

Com a aquisição do grupo BIG, em junho de 2022, demos início a mais uma etapa da nossa jornada que já dura 48 anos no Brasil. Unimos o melhor dos dois grupos e somos agora uma empresa mais diversa, com maior capacidade de inovar e causar impacto positivo na sociedade.

Estamos investindo fortemente na simplificação e na aceleração digital, pois acreditamos que esse é o caminho para nos transformar e sermos protagonistas da mudança que queremos ver no país.

Trabalhar no Grupo Carrefour Brasil é participar diariamente de tudo isso, em um ambiente que respeita e acolhe as diferenças com muito espaço para crescer e aprender. Somos muitos e queremos ser ainda mais.
E você também pode fazer parte dessa grande jornada. Com você, seremos ainda maiores.

Quer mudar a forma como o mundo se alimenta? #VemSerCarrefour

Conheça as nossas vagas, inscreva-se e vamos juntos mudar o mundo através da alimentação!

title: Consultor Comercial Contagem
description:
Sobre nós:
A Gade atua no setor de negócios desde 2010, oferecendo soluções que atendem empresas de diferentes nichos e que, principalmente, as afastam cada vez mais da temida inadimplência. Colocamos o empreendedor no centro de nossas ações e utilizamos eticamente o poder dos dados para obtermos sucesso junto ao nosso cliente. Com transparência e resiliência, alcançamos a qualidade nos nossos relacionamentos porque entendemos que essa é uma jornada entre nós e as marcas que acreditam na nossa competência.

Descrição do cargo:

Irá atuar como um intermediário estratégico entre a empresa e o cliente, sendo responsável por identificar oportunidades de negócios utilizando estratégias de vendas para a prospecção de novos relacionamentos sólidos.

Principais atividades:

  1. Prospecção de novos clientes, ofertando produtos de análise de crédito;
  2. Realização de vendas por telefone e presencial para os parceiros adquiridos;
  3. Realizar apresentações de vendas;
  4. Gestão dos clientes da carteira e indicações;
  5. Realização de retenção de clientes;
  6. Prestar suporte ao cliente no pós-vendas com eventuais dúvidas, a fim de solucionar problemas com rapidez e eficácia.

Requisitos Fundamentais:

  1. Possuir CNH;
  2. Veículo próprio;
  3. Notebook;

Habilidades Técnicas:

  1. Comunicação clara e assertiva;
  2. Persuasão;
  3. Conhecimento de Vendas;
  4. Relacionamento Interpessoal;
  5. Negociação;
  6. Organização e planejamento Comercial;

Habilidades Comportamentais:

  1. Proatividade, agilidade, raciocínio rápido e criatividade;
  2. Cordialidade, empatia, bom relacionamento com cliente e honestidade;
  3. Comunicativo (Comunicação afetiva/não violenta);
  4. Resiliência e Auto motivação;
  5. Pensamento positivo; Pensamento crítico; Responsabilidade.

title: Arquiteto(a) Pleno / Sênior - Elaboração de Projetos C30
description:
Arquiteto(a) Pleno / Sênior - Elaboração de Projetos C30 - Foco em Mercado Imobiliário

São Paulo - SP

O Liga Jobs, consultoria de RH, está assessorando com exclusividade escritório de arquitetura com forte atuação no mercado imobiliário que está buscando Arquiteto(a) para compor seu quadro de colaboradores nas seguintes atribuições:


Atividades:

  1. Desenvolver e acompanhar projetos arquitetônicos para novos empreendimentos imobiliários (residenciais, comerciais, etc.)
  2. Realizar estudos de viabilidade técnica e econômica dos projetos, garantindo que estejam dentro do orçamento e cronograma
  3. Apoiar na definição de estratégias de posicionamento de produto, considerando tendências de mercado e demandas dos consumidores
  4. Elaborar projetos legais para dar entrada em processos de legalização nos órgãos competentes
  5. Elaborar estudos preliminares e anteprojetos
  6. Acompanhar as etapas de aprovação em órgãos públicos e fornece suporte técnico durante o processo de licenciamento
  7. Colaborar com equipes de engenharia, construção e marketing para garantir que o design atenda às necessidades de mercado e dos stakeholders
  8. Acompanhar e revisar os projetos em todas as fases: concepção, anteprojeto, projeto executivo e compatibilização com outros projetos complementares (estrutural, elétrico, hidráulico etc.)
  9. Garantir a conformidade dos projetos com normas técnicas, legislações urbanísticas e ambientais
  10. Participar de reuniões de alinhamento com equipes de obra para garantir a correta execução do projeto executivo
  11. Cuidará de vários projetos ao mesmo tempo (média de 2 a 5 projetos)

Requisitos do cargo:

  1. Formação superior completa em Arquitetura e Urbanismo
  2. Projetos de edificações de grande porte / diversos andares do mercado imobiliário (edifícios residenciais e comerciais de qualquer padrão)
